Summary: Bright silver object over a swimming pool. Trees s
divs: sighting details mother and daughter saw a bright light over a swimming pool which was located inthe back yard of a home. a light came out of the bottom of the object. theywatched the object for one minute. silver in color. no openings or doors. nomore than 100 feet above the pool. the light reflected from the pool onto anearby house. after a minute it tilted sideways, rose slowly to above the trees,which "swished back and forth. then suddenly, boom, and it was gone quick."size: 3\4s of the size of a ranch house. no sound. the witnesses searched for itfor 15 minutes.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Springboro
